# Lord Steward Act 1554

|type=Act
|parliament=Parliament of England
|long_title=An Acte for thestablishing of thoffice of the L. Steward of the Quenes Majesties most Honourable Housholde.
|year=1553
|citation=1 Mar. Sess. 3. c. 4
|territorial_extent=England and Wales
|royal_assent=5 May 1554
|commencement=2 April 1554
|repeal_date=
|replaces=King's Household Act 1540
|related_legislation=Lord Keeper Act 1562
|repealing_legislation=
|status=Current
|original_text=https://babel.hathitrust.org/cgi/pt?id=pst.000017915519&seq=317

The Lord Steward Act 1554 (1 Mar. Sess. 3. c. 4) is an act of the Parliament of England.
The act was omitted from the third revised edition of the statute because of its local  nature.
The act had not been wholly repealed in Great Britain at the end of 2010.
Notes
